name: 2023 9th International Conference on Communication and Information Processing
content: PUBLICATION: ICCIP 2023 is to publish latest & high-quality research works on communication and information processing in theoretical and practical aspects. Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into ICCIP 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in the Online Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus
